ComicInfo.Title: Debts of Honor!
ComicInfo.Summary: Debts of Honor!: Thor returns to New York and reunites with Lorelei, but Roger smells an enchanted rat. Thor later brings Malekith to his father in Asgard and Odin tells all the tale of how he and his brothers faced and defeated Surtur when the world was young.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:24:43. [Issue ID 39322]
ComicInfo.Characters: Lorelei (villain),Beta Ray Bill (guest),Agnar (guest),Thor (feature),Roger Willis (guest),Surtur (villain),Volstagg] (guests),Vili (guest, death in flashback),Warriors Three [Fandral,Frigga (guest),Odin (guest),Malekith (villain),Ve (guest, death in flashback),Hogun,Silverhoof (Balder's horse, guest),Heimdall (guest),Balder (guest)
